product_name: Quiksilver Kaimana Apex Board Shorts - Men's - Black
long_description: Last one in the men's Quiksilver Kaimana Apex Black Board Shorts is a rotten egg! They feature lightweight and quick-drying fabric for any activity that involves water. Diamond-checkered lining reduces contact with skin and reduces rashing; fabric features high recycled content. Welt side pocket with pocket flap. The men's Quiksilver Kaimana Apex Board Shorts feature a classic surf closure.
